title: 服务器进不去
author: Peng_Lx
txt_content: 服务器进不去 错误报告 是 [size=13.3333px]java.io.IOException: Received string length longer than maximum allowed (24>16) 新人服主求帮助啊

replies.author: Peng_Lx
replies.txt_content: 等一下 错误报告是这个 大家别误会java.io.IOException: Received string length longer than maximum allowed (24>16)

replies.txt_content: 所有人都进不去那就是服务器后台问题 需要专门管理的 可以找一些精通后台的大神   望采纳
